markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Leiko](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2452)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Leiko](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2452)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=143" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 37</row>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Shae](/Languages.aspx?ID=71), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +9, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +11, [Shadow Plane Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +5

**Con** +1

**Int** +3

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Shadow Shift** Being made partially of shadow herself, Leikois [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) in dim light or darkness even to creatures that can see clearly in those light levels.

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (15)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 45

**Immunities**
precision

**Resistances**
cold 5, negative 5

**Counterattack <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** Leiko is targeted by an attack from an adjacent creature that misses due to Leiko being concealed** **Requirements** Leiko is aware of the attack; **Effect** Leiko makes a Strike against the attacker.

**Slip <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature moves adjacent to Leiko** **Effect** Leiko teleports to a clear space adjacent to another creature she can see within 30 feet.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 35 feet; swift steps, tenebral form

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing plus 1d6 cold

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing plus 1d6 cold

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 21
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)
- **4th**
[Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129) (at will)
- **7th**
[Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222)

**Bide** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Leiko prepares to take action against her foes, watching her opponent and waiting for the right opportunity to respond. Leiko gains a second reaction until the start of her next turn, though she still can't use more than one reaction on the same triggering action.

**Swift Steps**   Leiko's movement doesn't trigger reactions.

**Tenebral Form**   Leiko can Fly at full Speed in gaseous form.

</column>
name: Leiko

Items Dagger (15) --- AC 21 Fort +9 Ref +11 Will +10 HP 45 Immunities precision Resistances cold 5, negative 5 Counterattack Reaction Trigger Leiko is targeted by an attack from an adjacent creature that misses due to Leiko being concealed Requirements Leiko is aware of the attack; Effect Leiko makes a Strike against the attacker. Slip Reaction Trigger A creature moves adjacent to Leiko Effect Leiko teleports to a clear space adjacent to another creature she can see within 30 feet. --- Speed 25 feet, fly 35 feet; swift steps, tenebral form Melee Single Action dagger +13 (Agile, versatile S), Damage 1d4+5 piercing plus 1d6 cold Ranged Single Action dagger +13 (Agile, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 1d4+5 piercing plus 1d6 cold Occult Innate Spells DC 21 - Cantrips (2nd) Chill Touch, Detect Magic - 4th Gaseous Form (at will) - 7th Plane Shift Bide Two Actions Leiko prepares to take action against her foes, watching her opponent and waiting for the right opportunity to respond. Leiko gains a second reaction until the start of her next turn, though she still can't use more than one reaction on the same triggering action. Swift Steps Leiko's movement doesn't trigger reactions. Tenebral Form Leiko can Fly at full Speed in gaseous form.
